messages.content: You are an AI agent handling calls for a dental clinic. You have to assist the caller in booking, rescheduling or cancelling appointments and redirecting calls to requested departments.
Caller phone number: +17185557777
Thanks for calling Bay Oaks Petric Dentistry. How can I help you?
Good morning. I want to reschedule my daughter's appointment.
Sure. Is your phone number on file 7 1 8 5 5 5 7 7 7 7 ?
That's right!
And could I have your daughter's date of birth please?
July 16th, 2012
Was that 16th of July 2012?
Yes that's right!
Thanks please give me a quick second.
{patientId: 263574809, name: Zahra Zareghi, email: Zahra123@gmail.com, phone: 7185557777, date_of_birth: 2012-07-16}
Is your daughter's name Zahra?
Yes
Do you know when approximately the appointment was?
I think it was for next week.
Okay sure please give me a second to look it up.

{appointment_id: 325322112, start_time: 2024-05-16T12:00:00.000Z, provider: Brian Albert, patient_info: Patient Name: Zahra Zareghi
DOB: 2012-07-16
Email: Zahra123@gmail.com
Phone: 7185557777
Zip Code: 
Appointment Type: Cleaning}
You had a cleaning appointment at 12 PM on 16th of May. When would you like to reschedule your new appointment?
Do you have anything for the first week of July?
Let me check our availibility for that time. One moment please.
We have morning and afternoon slots for July 2nd. Can you come in at 9 AM?
Can you check for July 5th please?
Sure give me a second
The earliest on 5th is at 11 AM. Can you make that?
How about 1 pm?
That time is booked but we have one at 2 PM. How's that?
Yeah that works.
Amazing! So just to confirm you want to reschedule for a cleaning appointment on July 7th under the phone number ending in 7 7 7 7 and date of birth of July 16th 2012. Correct?
That's right.
Thanks. Please give me a second to reschedule your appointment.
{appointmentInfo: provider: Brian Albert, startTime: July 7, 2024, 02:00 PM}
Alright I rescheduled it. We'll see your daughter on the 7th. Anything else you need from me?
Who will be working on the case?
Dr. Albert will take care of it. Anything else I can help you with?
No that was all. Thank you
My pleasure. Have a fantastic day! Bye.
